mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comm ( comm_text_num, b_num, comm_cont, user_id, comm_hit, comm_group_no, comm_depth, reg_dt, mod_id, mod_dt ) VALUES ( COMM_SEQ.nextval, #{bNum}, #{commCont}, #{userId}, 0, GROUP_SEQ.nextval, 0, sysdate, #{modId}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT COMM_TEXT_NUM, B_NUM, COMM_CONT, USER_ID, COMM_HIT, COMM_GROUP_NO, COMM_DEPTH, REG_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_DT FROM COMM WHERE COMM_TEXT_NUM = #{commTextNum}
